summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Group Duties and Personnel Reassignment features. Both features work correctly with minor design feedback.
passed_tests: Backend: All 24 API tests passed (100% success rate)
Backend: PUT /api/assignments/{id} reassignment works correctly
Backend: POST /api/duty-group-configs creates group configurations
Backend: GET /api/duty-group-configs/{schedule_duty_id} retrieves configurations
Backend: POST /api/schedule-duties with duty_type='group' creates group duties
Frontend: 'Group of duties' option in Add Duty dropdown works
Frontend: 'New Duty Group' modal functionality complete
Frontend: Group duty appears correctly in calendar grid
Frontend: Clicking time cell on group row opens GroupDutyPanel
Frontend: GroupDutyPanel shows correct header and empty state
Frontend: 'Configure and Add Duties' button opens ConfigureDutiesModal
Frontend: ConfigureDutiesModal allows adding/configuring duty types and counts
Frontend: Adding rows and setting duty names/counts works properly
Frontend: Saving configuration displays duty slots with personnel dropdowns
Frontend: Personnel dropdowns show 6 available personnel with qualifications
Frontend: Personnel selection in group duty dropdowns works
Frontend: Personnel reassignment popover opens correctly
Frontend: Reassignment popover shows 6 personnel options with qualifications
Frontend: Personnel reassignment completes successfully with backend integration
Frontend: Success toast messages appear for reassignment actions
